attributes.action: Give the TAX payers a breakdown of where our TAX is being spent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The amount of TAX that the British Public now pays is getting ridiclous, I vote that the Government produce a breakdown of where the individual tax payers money goes each month as we automatically have this deducted from each paypacket but no idea where all of our hard earned money is being spent!!!!
